content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you found the apartment to your liking. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am aware that you are interested in the apartment. I propose a rental price of 700 Euro per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That's a fair offer, but I believe the apartment's prime location and amenities could fetch a higher price. How about 800 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: As a landlord, I have to consider the costs of maintaining the property. I could lower the price to 650 Euro per month, but I don't think I can go any lower.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your point, but as the landlord, I have to consider the potential income from the property. How about 750 Euro per month? It's a fair compromise.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, but 750 Euro per month is too high for this apartment. I can offer 680 Euro per month, which is the lowest I can go.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, but I think the value of the apartment justifies a higher price. How about 725 Euro per month? It's still a good deal for you, considering the apartment's location and amenities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is a reasonable offer. I accept the price of 725 Euro per month!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [725] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thanks for your time, Mr. Abbasi. I hope we can continue working together.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: You're welcome, Mr. Abbasi. I look forward to a long and fruitful relationship.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
